Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

The Super Jumbo residential mortgage loans are very important financial tools within the strata of high-value housing today, which requires heavy financing. These could be directed toward buyers who require extensive financing, usually in excess of four million dollars, to invest in luxury homes or extremely high-valued residences

Key Features:

  • The Super Jumbo loans have been designed to meet more than the standard Jumbo loans; these have, in turn, been designed to offer substantial amounts to either buy or refinance luxury homes.
  • Flexible Terms: Borrowers are offered a variety of flexible payment options where they can choose one of the available fixed and adjusted-rate terms according to their financial position.
  • Access granted: Super Jumbo loans often come with special services and other perks, such as personal support by highly experienced mortgage pros with particular experience in handling high-value deals.
Apply for Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

Contact Us below

Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

 HIGHLIGHTS

Max LTV:

80

Eligible Properties:

or Single Family, 2-4 Units, 5-20 Multifamily, Condo Townhouse, PUD

Amortization Terms:

40 Yr fixed, 30 Yr Fixed, 25 Yr Fixed, 20 Yr Fixed, 15 Yr Fixed, 10 Yr Fixed, 3/27 ARM, 5/25 ARM, 10/20 ARM, 10/15 ARM, 30/10 ARM, Interest Only, 10IO/20Amortized, 5/20 ARM

Max DTI:

45

Occupancy Types:

Primary, 2nd home, Investment

Minimum Loan Amount:

$4,000,000.00

Maximum Loan Amount:

$100,000,000.00

Minimum Mid Credit Score:

680 FICO

Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

 REQUIREMENTS

✓ Income:

2 Yrs Full Doc Taxes and or W2s Paystubs, 1 Yr Full Doc Taxes and or W2s Paystubs, 2 Yrs Bank Statements, 1 Yr Bank Statements

✓ Assets:

Verification of down payment if purchase – 2 months of bank statements for reserves

✓ Insurance

12 months of hazard insurance coverage paid at closing

✓ Title – Title:

insurance paid at closing

✓ Identification:

Copy of Drivers License/ID/Passport

✓ Valuation Requirement:

Appraisal or BPO or AVM

Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

What are

Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

At Custom Mortgage and Real Estate, we appreciate the peculiar needs that high-net-worth individuals have when it comes to Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans. Here is why we are the go-to:

Expertise in Jumbo Loans: We have a dedicated team with quite good knowledge and experience in larger value loans satisfying the best terms for you.
Personalised Service: Concierge-level service will tailor everything towards your financial needs while making sure the borrowing experience is seamless.
Sleek Process: From application to closing, we handle it all to ensure it’s one sleek process. Transparent Communication: Timely transparent communication. We shall keep updating you on everything that transpires throughout the process of loans.

Apply for a

Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

Benefits of

Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

There are numerous benefits derived from Super Jumbo residential mortgage loans, which make them very attractive to qualified borrowers.

Financial Flexibility: It realizes large purchasing power where big properties can be financed without liquidation.

Competitive rates: Interest rates still remain competitive, probably saving you over the life of the loan with high amounts.

Tailor-made solutions: Super Jumbo loans can be customized under an individual financial strategy so these types of loans go well with complicated financial portfolios.

Apply for a

Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

How to qualify for a

Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

Following are the sundry aspects qualifying one to obtain a super jumbo residential mortgage loan:

Minimum Credit Score: The general requirement is a minimum of 700; the better the score, the better the terms.
Debt-to-Income Ratio: The regular debt-to-income ratio should be less than 43%; this is always better for borrowers to afford the loan repayments.
Down payment requirements are generally 20%, but this all will be different since everyone’s situation may be different.
Income Verification: This requires detailed income documentation from the borrower, including tax returns and employment verification.
Appraisal of Property: This involves a professional assessment of the value of the property being appraised to make sure it is within the loan parameters.

Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

FAQ's for

Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

Just what is a Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loan?

A mortgage to pay for amounts typically over $3 million that are sometimes needed for high-end properties.

What’s the difference between a Super Jumbo loan and a Jumbo loan?

Super Jumbo loans have amounts that exceed regular limits set for Jumbo loans, with sometimes tougher qualifications.

What are most typical minimum down payments?

Typically around 20%, though that can vary due to financial conditions of the bank and borrower.

How is the rate of interest decided?

These rates will vary based on the credit score, amount of the loan, and present market circumstances.

Can I use a Super Jumbo loan for purchasing a second home?

In fact, these loans can encompass second homes, which also include vacation homes.

What kind of repayments are offered?

Borrowers can choose between fixed-rate or variable-rate mortgages, and terms may vary.

Is there a penalty for prepayment?

Some mortgages do carry prepayment penalties; the terms for these will be given at closing.

How long does the usual approval process last?

This normally takes a couple of weeks, depending on the complexity of the application and the property.

What documentation is needed?

All relevant financial documentation, tax returns, bank statements, and proof of income. Can I refinance a Super Jumbo loan? Of course, people refinance all the time-to take advantage of better rates or terms.

Apply for a

Super Jumbo Residential Mortgage Loans

content.rendered:
FHA VOE Only Mortgage Loans

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program or VOE (Verification of Employment) loan programs are available for wage earners who prefer not to use conventional income documentation. These programs simplify the mortgage process by primarily relying on employment verification rather than extensive financial paperwork.  With a VOE mortgage, borrowers don’t need to provide W-2s, pay stubs, or tax returns. Instead, the verification is handled directly with the employer, making the process faster and more convenient than traditional mortgage applications

An FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program is a specialized loan program designed to simplify the mortgage application process for wage earners by relying solely on a Verification of Employment (VOE). Unlike traditional mortgage applications, which require extensive income documentation such as tax returns, pay stubs, and bank statements, the FHA VOE Only Mortgage streamlines the process by focusing exclusively on employment verification. This means that borrowers can qualify for a mortgage based on their employment status, without the need to provide other financial documents. This approach not only expedites the loan approval process but also makes it more accessible for individuals who have stable employment but may lack traditional income documentation. As a result, the FHA VOE Only Mortgage offers a faster, more convenient, and less cumbersome path to homeownership, making it an attractive option for many wage.

These programs can be particularly helpful for borrowers who have been denied or rejected by more stringent loan requirements. Our FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program offers an alternative path to homeownership for qualified wage earners.  At Custom Mortgage and Real Estate, we offer this special VOE Only program to provide our clients with a more streamlined and accessible mortgage option. Our expertise in alternative financing allows us to help borrowers who might not qualify for traditional mortgage products, making homeownership more attainable for a wider range of clients.

Key features of FHA VOE loan programs include:

✔ Faster approval process compared to conventional or standard FHA loans
✔ Minimum credit score requirements (typically 640)
✔ Employment history of at least 2 years with the same employer
✔ Loan amounts up to $1,149,825.00 in some cases
✔ Option to use 100% gift funds for down payment
✔ Flexible loan terms, including 30-year fixed and adjustable-rate options

Apply for FHA VOE Only Mortgage Loans

Contact Us below

Apply for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

What are

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

The FHA VOE Only Mortgage Loan Program is a specialized lending option designed to make homeownership more accessible for borrowers who may not have the traditional income documentation required by other mortgage programs. This program emphasizes verifying the borrower’s employment status rather than analyzing comprehensive financial documents such as tax returns, making it a flexible and accommodating solution for those with non-traditional income streams or employment situations.

One of the key features of this program is its reliance on the Verification of Employment (VOE), which serves as the primary qualification criterion. By focusing on the borrower’s current employment, the FHA VOE Only Mortgage Loan Program significantly reduces the complexity and time involved in the mortgage approval process. This makes it an attractive option for a wide range of borrowers, including self-employed individuals, freelancers, contractors, and others who may have found it difficult to meet the stringent requirements of conventional loans.

In addition to its flexible documentation requirements, the FHA VOE Only Mortgage Loan Program benefits from the backing of the Federal Housing Administration (FHA). This government backing provides an extra layer of security for both lenders and borrowers, resulting in competitive interest rates and more favorable loan terms. Moreover, the program’s high Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratio allows borrowers to finance up to 96.5% of the property’s purchase price, minimizing the upfront costs typically associated with home buying.

Ultimately, the FHA VOE Only Mortgage Loan Program offers a streamlined, efficient path to homeownership, particularly for those who may have previously been underserved by traditional mortgage options. Its focus on employment verification, combined with the advantages of FHA backing, makes it an invaluable resource for anyone looking to secure a mortgage with less conventional means.

Apply for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

Benefits of

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

Simplified Qualification: Employment verification is the primary requirement.

No Extensive Income Documentation: No need for tax returns or pay stubs.

Flexible Terms: Tailored to meet non-traditional income scenarios.

FHA Backing: Competitive interest rates and lower down payments.

Accessible Homeownership: Ideal for irregular income earners.

Apply for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

How to qualify for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

Qualifying for the FHA VOE Only Mortgage Loan Program with Custom Mortgage and Real Estate is a straightforward process, especially for those with stable employment. Here’s what you’ll need:

  • Verification of Employment (VOE): This is the primary requirement. We will confirm your current employment status with your employer.
  • Consistent Employment History: Ideally, a minimum of two years with the same employer, or in the same industry, strengthens your application.
  • Good Employment Stability: Demonstrating stable and ongoing employment is crucial.
  • FHA Requirements: While income documentation is minimal, you must still meet other FHA guidelines, such as citizenship or residency status.
  • Adequate Down Payment: Typically, a down payment of 3.5% of the purchase price is required.
  • Creditworthiness: A fair credit score is necessary, though less emphasis is placed on it compared to conventional loans.
  • Debt-to-Income Ratio: Should be within FHA limits, but flexibility is often granted due to the program’s nature.
Apply for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

Why choose CMRE for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

When you choose Custom Mortgage and Real Estate for the FHA VOE Only Mortgage Loan Program, you’re opting for a partner who understands your unique financial situation and is committed to helping you achieve your homeownership goals. Here’s why we stand out:

  • Expertise in Non-Traditional Lending: We specialize in programs that cater to borrowers with unconventional income sources.
  • Personalized Service: Our team provides one-on-one guidance, ensuring the loan process is tailored to your specific needs.
  • Fast and Efficient Process: We streamline the approval process to get you into your home faster.
  • Flexible Loan Options: We offer a variety of FHA-backed loan products, allowing you to choose the best fit for your circumstances.
  • Commitment to Transparency: We ensure you understand every step of the process with clear and honest communication.
  • Trusted Local Knowledge: Our deep understanding of the local market helps us secure the best terms for your loan.

Apply for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

FAQ's for

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

1. What does VOE stand for in this program?
VOE stands for Verification of Employment, which is the key factor in qualifying for this loan.

2. Is

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

available for first-time homebuyers?
Yes, this program is well-suited for first-time homebuyers who may not have extensive income documentation.

3. Can I qualify if I’m self-employed for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
No self-employed options available.

4. How quickly can I get approved for

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Approval times are typically faster than conventional loans due to the streamlined documentation requirements.

5. What if I have a gap in my employment history?
A short employment gap may be acceptable, but consistent employment is preferred.

6. Are there additional costs associated with a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
FHA loans require mortgage insurance premiums (MIP), which are added to your monthly payments.

7. Can I use gift funds for the down payment on a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Yes, FHA allows for down payments to be made with gift funds from an approved source.

8. What type of property can I buy with a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
This program is available for single-family homes, townhomes, and approved condos.

9. What is the minimum credit score required for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Typically, a credit score of 580 is required, but some lenders may consider lower scores.

10. How does the employment verification process work?
We contact your employer directly to verify your current employment status and details.

11. Can I refinance an existing FHA loan using a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Yes, refinancing options are available under this program.

12. Is

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

available nationwide?
Yes, it is available throughout the United States wherever FHA loans are offered.

13. What if my income varies month to month?
Since this program focuses on employment status, variable income is less of a concern.

14. Do I need to be a full-time employee for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Full-time employment is preferred, but part-time work may also be considered.

15. What documentation is needed besides employment verification for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Minimal documentation is required, mostly related to the property and FHA guidelines.

16. Can I use

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

for an investment property?
No, this program is for primary residences and second homes only.

17. What happens if I lose my job during the loan process?
Losing your job may affect your qualification status, so it’s important to maintain employment until closing.

18. Are there income limits for this

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
No, there are no income limits, but the loan amount must fall within FHA guidelines.

19. Is there a prepayment penalty

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
No, FHA loans do not have prepayment penalties.

20. What other costs should I expect

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Expect standard closing costs, including appraisal, title insurance, and FHA-related fees.

Apply for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

Qualifying for the FHA VOE Only Mortgage Loan Program with Custom Mortgage and Real Estate is a straightforward process, especially for those with stable employment. Here’s what you’ll need:

  • Verification of Employment (VOE): This is the primary requirement. We will confirm your current employment status with your employer.
  • Consistent Employment History: Ideally, a minimum of two years with the same employer, or in the same industry, strengthens your application.
  • Good Employment Stability: Demonstrating stable and ongoing employment is crucial.
  • FHA Requirements: While income documentation is minimal, you must still meet other FHA guidelines, such as citizenship or residency status.
  • Adequate Down Payment: Typically, a down payment of 3.5% of the purchase price is required.
  • Creditworthiness: A fair credit score is necessary, though less emphasis is placed on it compared to conventional loans.
  • Debt-to-Income Ratio: Should be within FHA limits, but flexibility is often granted due to the program’s nature.
acf.why_us:
When you choose Custom Mortgage and Real Estate for the FHA VOE Only Mortgage Loan Program, you’re opting for a partner who understands your unique financial situation and is committed to helping you achieve your homeownership goals. Here’s why we stand out:

  • Expertise in Non-Traditional Lending: We specialize in programs that cater to borrowers with unconventional income sources.
  • Personalized Service: Our team provides one-on-one guidance, ensuring the loan process is tailored to your specific needs.
  • Fast and Efficient Process: We streamline the approval process to get you into your home faster.
  • Flexible Loan Options: We offer a variety of FHA-backed loan products, allowing you to choose the best fit for your circumstances.
  • Commitment to Transparency: We ensure you understand every step of the process with clear and honest communication.
  • Trusted Local Knowledge: Our deep understanding of the local market helps us secure the best terms for your loan.
acf.Program_FAQ:
1. What does VOE stand for in this program?
VOE stands for Verification of Employment, which is the key factor in qualifying for this loan.

2. Is

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

available for first-time homebuyers?
Yes, this program is well-suited for first-time homebuyers who may not have extensive income documentation.

3. Can I qualify if I’m self-employed for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
No self-employed options available.

4. How quickly can I get approved for

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Approval times are typically faster than conventional loans due to the streamlined documentation requirements.

5. What if I have a gap in my employment history?
A short employment gap may be acceptable, but consistent employment is preferred.

6. Are there additional costs associated with a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
FHA loans require mortgage insurance premiums (MIP), which are added to your monthly payments.

7. Can I use gift funds for the down payment on a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Yes, FHA allows for down payments to be made with gift funds from an approved source.

8. What type of property can I buy with a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
This program is available for single-family homes, townhomes, and approved condos.

9. What is the minimum credit score required for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Typically, a credit score of 580 is required, but some lenders may consider lower scores.

10. How does the employment verification process work?
We contact your employer directly to verify your current employment status and details.

11. Can I refinance an existing FHA loan using a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Yes, refinancing options are available under this program.

12. Is

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

available nationwide?
Yes, it is available throughout the United States wherever FHA loans are offered.

13. What if my income varies month to month?
Since this program focuses on employment status, variable income is less of a concern.

14. Do I need to be a full-time employee for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Full-time employment is preferred, but part-time work may also be considered.

15. What documentation is needed besides employment verification for a

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Minimal documentation is required, mostly related to the property and FHA guidelines.

16. Can I use

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

for an investment property?
No, this program is for primary residences and second homes only.

17. What happens if I lose my job during the loan process?
Losing your job may affect your qualification status, so it’s important to maintain employment until closing.

18. Are there income limits for this

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
No, there are no income limits, but the loan amount must fall within FHA guidelines.

19. Is there a prepayment penalty

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
No, FHA loans do not have prepayment penalties.

20. What other costs should I expect

FHA VOE Only Mortgage Program

?
Expect standard closing costs, including appraisal, title insurance, and FHA-related fees.
